amendment.description: Amendment sought to delay the implementation of the bill, if enacted, so long as sequestration is in effect.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 113-272 to delay the implementation of the bill, if enacted, so long as sequestration is in effect.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 243 (Roll no. 608).

action.text: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
